title: WHO ARE THEY?
subtitle: BTS, also known as Bangtan Boys.
detail: BTS Bangtan Sonyeondan, also known as the Bangtan Boys, Their work also often references literature and psychological concepts and includes an alternative universe storyline.

title: 방탄소년단
subtitle: ARMY (a fitting name for the organized passion of BTS fans) is actually an acronym for Adorable Representative MC for Youth.
